garden_desc: A versatile hospitality property in the heart of Scanno, nestled in the soul of Abruzzo.
garden_location: Overlooking the historic center of Scanno
garden_text1:
The Garden Hotel represents a unique opportunity in the heart of Abruzzo: a historic accommodation facility, well-distributed and ready to be relaunched or transformed according to new needs.



Thanks to its versatility, the structure lends itself to numerous alternative uses: tourist residence, retirement home for self-sufficient elderly people, health residence, wellness center or SPA, apartment complex for sale or rent.



Born as a three-star hotel in 1964, it has been the subject of numerous expansions and modernizations until it achieved the four-star classification in 1996, remaining the only hotel of this category in Scanno.



The structure was managed continuously until a few years ago and is currently in good general condition, although it requires system updates and partial but not structural renovation work.
